data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core TRAVESS2, Lagoa Travessa II, Portugal

North-East margin of the mire. Local vegetation: Molinion-Agrostion wet prairie. Core diameter: 10 cm. Area: 13 ha. Semi-terrestrial lagoon fen. Physiography: perimarine interdunal lagoon. Surrounding vegetation: Halimietalia commutati scrubs with pine.
